Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Oliver H
Reviews.Content: stayed omm april hotel located centrally barcelona shops tourist attractions easy walking distance excellent clean modern proportioned negatives stay hotel gym wouldn’t call gym ive seen home gyms equipment treadmill bike weights pretty poor hotel staff lobby barrestaurant serving customers days breakfast hotel practically force waiter bill overall lovely hotel exercise breakfast recommend leave hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great city hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: m64
Reviews.Content: wife stayed weekend january fantastic time 1st time barcelona found easy navigate hotel using subway main streets beach host shops restaurants inside foyer trendy spacious moo restuarant view hotel staff friendly able wish size city hotel studio feel hotel bar restaurant waiters job happening spot city feel welcome definately recommend resting spot barcelona offer
